versos: (departed) Isaiah 38:10 - "I said I shall not see the Lord, even the Lord, in the land of the living; I shall behold man no more with the inhabitants of the world.";;;
(passed) Genesis 19:33 - "That night they got their father to drink wine, and the older daughter went in and lay with him.";;;

(mountain) Matthew 17:20 - He replied, "Because you have so little faith. Truly I tell you, if you have faith as small as a mustard seed, you can say to this mountain, 'Move from here to there,' and it will move. Nothing will be impossible for you.";;;
(treasury) Matthew 27:6 - "But the chief priests took the silver coins and said, Its not lawful to put this into the treasury, since it is blood money.";;;

(famine) Amos 8:11 - "Behold, the days are coming," declares the Lord God, "when I will send a famine on the landnot a famine of bread, nor a thirst for water, but of hearing the words of the Lord.";;;
(sojourn) Genesis 12:10 - Now there was a famine in the land. So Abram went down to Egypt to sojourn there
(beheld) John 1:32 - "And John bare record, saying, I saw the Spirit descending from heaven like a dove, and it abode upon him.";;;
(pharaoh) Genesis 12:15 - "When the officials of pharaoh saw her, they praised her to pharaoh, and she was taken into his palace.";;;
(gilead) Jeremiah 8:22 - Is there no balm in gilead Is there no physician there Why then is there no healing for the wound of my people;;;
(mirth) Ecclesiastes 7:3 - "Sorrow is better than laughter: for by the sadness of the countenance the heart is made better.";;;
(oxen) Proverbs 14:4: "Where there are no oxen, the manger is clean, but abundant crops come by the strength of the ox.";;;
(asses) Genesis 12:16 - And he entreated Abram well for her sake: and he had sheep
(camels) Genesis 24:64 - And Rebekah lifted up her eyes

(plagues) Revelation 22:18 - "I warn everyone who hears the words of the prophecy of this scroll: If anyone adds anything to them, God will add to that person the plagues described in this scroll.";;;
(didst) Psalm 117:2 - For his merciful kindness is great toward us: and the truth of the Lord endureth for ever. Praise ye the Lord.;;;

(rich) James 2:5 - "Listen, my dear brothers and sisters: Has not God chosen those who are poor in the eyes of the world to be rich in faith and to inherit the kingdom he promised those who love him";;;
